text: Ðis is hwitan cirican landboc.
Ðis synð þa landgemære to hwitan cyrican.
Ærest þær seo dic sciet of terstan andlang dic to þære haran apoldræ þanon on geapan garan westeweardne.
Ðæt andlang þæs weges þæ lið andlang ðære dæne.
To ðære stræt.
Ðet þanon to bradan lea.
Þæt andlang þæs ealdæs weges to wifan stoccæ.
Ðonon andlang wintres dæne oðða stræt.
Þanon andlang stræt on þonæ easternan æsphangran wæsteweardnæ.
Þonon suð on gerihta utt þurh hwitan lea þæt on whitan leasheal ðæt forð on geryhta be eastan weræles wellæ.
Þonon forð on wulflea wæsteweardnæ.
Þæt swa forð on grawes þorn wið earna leas.
Þæt þurh earna lea be eastan forseaþas on þæt del.
Þonon wæst to cealcgrafon.
Þar horo weg utt sceat utt þurh cealcgrafas on fearnbraca suðeweardæ on þonæ ealdan stapol.
Þanon forð on hocingmæda westeweardnæ.
Þonon norð on þa rodæ be eastan mæredunæ.
Þæt swa forð to æþelheahes þornæ.
Þonon forð on blacan wylles heafoð þæt ofer þonæ igaþ utt on terstan.
Þæt andlang terstan to æscwaldæs byge.
Þæt æft to þære dic þær hio sciet of terstan.
Ðis synt þa gemæra þa bæra ðe hierað to whitan cirican fiscesburnan and felghyrste.
Ærest on þingleage on ðæs wielles heafod.
Ðonon andlang hagan on gerihte to clatleage.
Þat ðuores ofer clatleage on gerihte to grænan leage.
Þæt ofer þa leage to nafæ on gearihte to eanan leage.
Þæt andlang hagan to hamtunstigelæ.
Þonon andlang hagan to nican snadæs forda.
Þonon andlang hagan to wissan leage gatæ.
Þonon on þonæ wæstmæstan snad on beaggan hyrste.
Ðæt þonon ofer þonæ fæld on þing leage æft to þæs wielles heafde.
Ðis synt þa landgemæru to æscmeres wierðe ðæ to witan cyrican hierð.
Ærest on hyldan hlawe.
Þonon for bealdan ærsc easteweardnæ andlang þæs hlinces ðæt to goosdænæ andlang dænæ.
Þæt bæ westan hwyðian pyt.
Þæt ofer wat oran.
Þæt andlang þære denæ to þam hagan.
Þæt andlang hagan for middel oran norðewearðnæ andlang hagan on cealfa leage norðewearde.
Þonnæ andlang weges utt to baggan leage.
Þonon andlang hagan to ullan crywelæ.
Þæt andlang hagan to æcsbyrhtæs geate.
Ðonon andlang hagan to mintleage.
Andlang myntleage riple utt on alorburnan.
Þonon andlang alorburnan oð sceapwæscan upp andlang sceapwæscan to sceapwæscan forda.
Þæt andlang hunigwiellæs weges to bræges wiþæ stanæ upp andlang ealdhunæs dæne utt þurh afocan lea on þonæ wæsterran wæg.
Ðæt andlang weges.
Æft to hildan hlawe.

Friðestan biscop & þa hiwan on Winteceastræ bebeodad on Godas naman ælmihtiges & on sanctæs Petres ðæs ealdorapostolæs & on ealra Godæs haligra naman þæt ðæt land æt æcsmæres wierðe sie agifen ofer Eadwardes cingæs dæg umbæ sæcæn to Wintæceastræ.
Þam hiwon into heore beoddærn & gif hit hwa wænde.
Þænnæ wændæ he hit of Godæs bæbod.
And ofer ealra ðissa witena þæ heora naman hæron awritæne standad.
